entry.title: LSP Circulation Report â€”May 2023
entry.content: Just like we mentioned in our tokenomics article, in order to be more transparent and to increase your awareness about the $LSP unlocking process, weâ€™ll be making a report about addresses that are associated with the Lumenswap team and its treasury every month. You can see unlocked and locked assets for each address in thisÂ report.1. PublicÂ saleAddress: GA6N5CBQâ€¦FX56B72DAllocation: 120,000,000 LSPÂ (12%)Vesting info: 100%Â TGELocked: 0Unlocked: 120,000,000 LSP2. TeamAddress: GB6OM72Câ€¦MV5XLD4IAllocation: 190,000,000 LSPÂ (19%)Vesting info: 2 years lock then unlock linearly over the 1Â yearLocked: 190,000,000 LSPUnlocked: 03. AdvisorAddress: GDTSM26Bâ€¦HXW5WIUMAllocation: 30,000,000 LSPÂ (3%)Vesting info: Unlock linearly over 1 year fromÂ TGELocked: 330,168Â LSPUnlocked: 29,669,832 LSP4. Ecosystem rewardAddress: GDDD65VOâ€¦GSZE6BBYAllocation: 400,000,000 LSPÂ (40%)Vesting info: Unlock linearly over 10 years fromÂ TGELocked: 283,194,458 LSPUnlocked: 116,805,542 LSP5. MarketingAddress: GCYN3F4Dâ€¦5J266YLJAllocation: 100,000,000 LSPÂ (10%)Vesting info: 1 year vesting, 25% per 3Â months.Locked: 46,398,255 LSPUnlocked: 53,601,745 LSP6. FoundationAddress: GCLQTGIHâ€¦J2EODJH3Allocation: 160,000,000 LSPÂ (16%)Vesting info: Unlock linearly over 2 years fromÂ TGE.Locked: 103,887,506 LSPUnlocked: 56,112,494 LSPGeneral statsUnlocked supply: 376,189,613 LSPBurned supply: 9,967,546 LSPÂ ðŸ”¥Locked supply: 623,810,387 LSPTotal supply: 990,032,454 LSPWe chose transparency as one of our main goals from day one and decided to make Lumenswap something that belongs to the community, and we will continue this path in theÂ future.Thank you for reading thisÂ article.LSP Circulation Report â€”May 2023 was originally published in Lumenswap on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

Moving forward, we will distribute the rewards on the 28th of eachÂ month.Note: This monthâ€™s snapshot was taken on theÂ 14th.As we said in the ecosystem reward article, every month, we publish a list of all the addresses that receive rewards.
